Name: Aliens After Ava
About the game: The aliens are here... You are Ava, a survivor out in the wild in the midst of an alien invasion. Fight back as you dodge, jump, roll, and use advanced technology to navigate your escape across terrain and extraterrestrial foes! Features Procedural generated obstacles and foes! 3 levels with their own unique boss battle 4 unique plutonium based armaments Hand drawn animation and art style Coming Soon... Infinite run mode Boss marathon mode Zen mode Difficulty adjustment Additional levels and armaments Backpack menu featuring armament upgrades and selection, alien info, and 'lost and found' items
